_comment: Template for React/SPA sites with URL-based navigation (hash routing)
_comment_when_to_use: Use when bootstrap_recorder discovers multiple URLs with hash fragments (#/path)
_comment_advantages: Most reliable - no fragile selectors, works immediately, no click timing issues
_comment_usage: 1. Run bootstrap_recorder.py with --record-video, 2. Wait 10+ seconds before clicking, 3. Copy generated .bootstrap.json URLs here
name: your_site_name

watch._comment_target1: Home view - base URL without hash
watch.name: home_dashboard

watch._comment_target2: Performance view - URL with hash routing
watch.name: performance_view

_comment_workflow: STEP 1: Run bootstrap recorder and discover URLs
STEP 2: Wait 10+ seconds after page loads before clicking anything (let React event listeners initialize)
STEP 3: Click through all views you want to capture
STEP 4: Review generated sites/test_site.bootstrap.json - if it has multiple URLs with hash fragments, use this template
STEP 5: Copy URLs from generated config to this template, adjust settle_ms if needed
STEP 7: Review screenshots - increase settle_ms if you see loading spinners or blank content
_comment_timing_guide: settle_ms: Time to wait after navigation before screenshot
- 15000ms (15s): Use for slow APIs or complex charts
- 20000ms (20s): Use only if you see loading states in screenshots
_comment_troubleshooting: If screenshots are blank or show loading:
→ Check browser console in bootstrap_recorder video for errors
If you see 'element not found' errors:
→ Wrong template! You need react-click-based.template.json instead
→ This template is for URL-based navigation only
